info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:47PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Otero County through 115 PM MDT... At 1246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Apache Summit, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Otero County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
